1)
SELECT result_time,nodeid FROM sensors WHERE light>550;
2015-03-05 09:10:18|1

2)
SELECT avg(light) FROM sensors WHERE nodeid == 1 AND time(result_time) BETWEEN '06:00:00' AND '09:59:59' ;
555.0

3)
SELECT avg(light) FROM sensors WHERE nodeid == 1 AND time(result_time) BETWEEN '09:00:01' AND '10:59:59' ;
556.0

4)
